function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of formal data sources in informal settlements","Impact":"Lack of accurate data leads to ineffective disease response strategies","Mitigation":"Empower local communities to collect and share their own sociodemographic data","Technologies":"Open-source mapping tools, online networks, smartphone-based data collection","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local community organizations and urban observatories"},{"Description":"Reliance on online crowdsourced mapping","Impact":"Inaccuracy or bias in data collected through crowdsourced mapping","Mitigation":"Combine crowdsourced data with other sources for validation and verification","Technologies":"Data validation and verification tools, machine learning algorithms","People":"Online community contributors","Owner":"Data validation and verification teams"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination and communication between data producers","Impact":"Failure to channel essential urban data to support response planning","Mitigation":"Establish partnerships and coordination mechanisms between data producers and response planning authorities","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, data sharing protocols","People":"Urban data practitioners, response planning authorities","Owner":"Partnerships and coordination entities"}]}
